a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Distribution of population between different poverty thresholds, World,
This data is adjusted for inflation and for differences in the cost of living between countries.
Data source: World Bank Poverty and Inequality Platform (2023)
Note: This data is expressed in international-$ at 2017 prices. Depending on the country and year, it relates to income measured after
taxes and benefits, or to consumption, per capita.
